assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Premier Explosives Limited manufactures and sells high energy materials. The company offers bulk explosives, packaged explosives, detonators, detonating fuse, cast and emulsion boosters, solid propellants, pyrogen igniters, pyro devices, explosive bolts, pyro actuators, smoke markers, cable cutters, etc. that have applications in mining, infrastructure, defence, space, homeland security, and other areas. The company also operates and maintains solid propellant plants of defence and space establishments. The company markets its products through a network comprising consignment agents, dealers, and handling agents across India. It also exports commercial explosives to S.E. Asian, the Middle Eastern, and European countries. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Secunderabad, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Y. Durga Prasad Rao
companyOfficers.title: Director of Operations &  Whole time Director
